post:
## Hello Everyone!
## 
## We've skipped the last year's Black Friday but we're so happy to be able to offer you some amazing deals this year!
## I hope you all enjoy them! <3

👇 Should you have any questions how it works, ask in the comments below👇
___________________________________________________________________________________________

## :star: Resource Bundles (VDR) Available in Seattle, Dallas or New York:star:

What is VDR?🧐  It is a bundle of resources. You can create your servers the way you want. Spread out your resources between many or just a single server. You can choose between 3 Premium Locations in the US - Dallas, Seattle or New York. 

**VDR Yearly:**
1 vCPU Limit
512MB RAM Limit
10GB SSD Disk Limit
512GB Bandwidth Limit
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6

🔥 $15.00 USD Annually
[ORDER HERE](https://impactvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=37 "ORDER HERE")

**VDR2:**
3 vCPUs Limit
2GB RAM Limit
30GB SSD Disk Limit
2TB Bandwidth Limit
3 IPv4s
/64 IPv6

🔥 $4.00 USD Monthly OR $48.00 USD Annually 

USE PROMOCODE: LETVDR2G
[ORDER HERE](https://impactvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=36 "ORDER HERE")

**VDR4:**
4 vCPUs Limit
4GB RAM Limit
45GB SSD Disk Limit
2TB Bandwidth Limit
5 IPv4s
/64 IPv6

🔥 $7.00 USD Monthly OR $84.00 USD Annually

USE PROMOCODE: LETVDR4G
[ORDER HERE](https://impactvps.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=23 "ORDER HERE")

Test IPs available at:
Seattle: https://lg-sea.impactvps.com/
Dallas: https://lg-dal.impactvps.com/
New York: https://lg-nyc.impactvps.com/

## FAQ:
1. PRICES ARE VAT EXCLUSIVE
2. We're EU registered company and as such we charge VAT to all EU residents & companies without a valid VAT ID.
3. VAT WILL NOT be charged to residents and companies outside the EU.
4. Make sure to submit a valid personal information otherwise orders will be rejected.****
